Not sure what's going on, I'm using Windows and Chrome version 34.0.1847.131.

Image:
Try resetting the zoom to 100%, that fixed it for me.

It's because there's too many items in the navbar, which on lower resolutions will cause this 'bug' to appear in the vBulletin theme. There isn't much I can do to change it at the moment, but we'll look into it.

That was at 100%, and changing it and putting it back doesn't seem to fix it. It looks better at 90%, but the search bar covers the IRC chat button.

Edit: That's with a 1280 pixel wide window. It does improve when widened.

Better, but the search box still covers the IRC chat button.

Edit: I'm betting it's the "legacy" added to the Spaceport button that made this noticeable to me.
